item.title: Music Vision Sound
Music Vision Sound
item.description:
Music Vision Sound

What techniques and tools do you use to keep yourself organized? I use the passion as my technique, I don´t work with expensive tools or programs with my art everything digital or handmade it´s the product of the creativity and that inner wish to go beyond every day.

item.title: "Sometimes It Snows In April" from Parade (Music from the Motion Picture Under the Cherry Moon) by Prince on iTunes
item.description:
"Sometimes It Snows In April" from Parade (Music from the Motion Picture Under the Cherry Moon) by Prince on iTunes

Preview, buy, and download the song "Sometimes It Snows In April" from the album Parade (Music from the Motion Picture Under the Cherry Moon) for £0.99. Free with Apple Music subscription.

item.title: ARTISTS, MUSICIANS, BANDS, AUTHORS, DESIGNERS, MODELS, FASHION, DESIGN, STREETART, 3DART COME JOIN IN AND SHARE YOUR CREATIVE WORKS IN THE #MVSCreatives FOR A LIVE UPDATE AND RT ON THE MVS SOCIAL NETWORKS AND SITES!! goes live here CREATIVES HOUR (FREE PROMO) Online Twitter Event every Tuesday 9pm-10pm (GMT) CREATIVES PLEASE ONLY TWEET DIRECT TO THE HASHTAG MEDIA MUST BE POSTED IN THE TWEET, YOUR OWN BLOGS AND WEBSITES CAN BE SHARED TOO!!HOPE TO SEE YOU ALL JOIN IN THE CREATIVE BLASTIVITIES :)
